sources.title: Cheer Boys Cheer
sources.description: Ironside, an inferior brewer, enlists his son John in a ruse to acquire venerable rival Greenleaf; but a romance between John and Greenleafâ€™s lovely daughter intervenes.

metadata.Plot: Set in the world of brewing, a classic tale (an Ealing speciality) of the small, friendly, family run company being threatened with closure by the nasty, modern, large organisation. Bringing in familiar farce elements such as mistaken identity, slapstick and even pie fights, the tale is resolved through the love felt by the children of the opposing brewery owners.
metadata.Writer: Ian Dalrymple, Donald Bull, Allan MacKinnon
metadata.Actors: Nova Pilbeam, Edmund Gwenn, Jimmy O'Dea
